overview:
Seamus J. Devine Founder, Director of Global Sales Price & Quote, http://priceandquote.com/

Seamus leads Price & Quote’s worldwide sales teams, focusing on growing the company’s business globally. Seamus is responsible for bringing Price & Quote’s powerful Sales Engine to organisations of all sizes globally, empowering customers to become exponentially more efficient, responsive and profitable.

Prior to Price & Quote, Seamus was sales director at TIBCO Software, responsible for Enterprise Sales and Channel and Partner sales in Central and Eastern Europe, where he rapidly expanded the customer base and drove the region’s rapid growth across all verticals. Prior to TIBCO, Seamus held multiple Enterprise Sales roles at BEA Systems in San Francisco, London and the Czech Republic. Prior to BEA, Seamus held sales roles at OneSecure (acquired by Juniper Networks), Level 3 Communications and MCI Communications. Seamus holds a BS in Finance and Management from the University of Oregon’s Lundquist School of Business.
